Title: I Knew Your Pig
Plot: Patty begins to suspect Purcell of withholding vital information; Ellen uncovers a decades-old secret from Patty and Purcell's past.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language,drug use and sexual references
Writer: Todd A. Kessler, Glenn Kessler, Daniel Zelman
GuestStars: Glenn Kessler, Philip Bosco, Michael Nouri, Zachary Booth, Mario Van Peebles, Brett Cullen, Paige Turco
